I bloody love this game. 
I only have 1.k hours on average but this number will keep growing!
     Even with the disappointments with the latest updates, Meet your Match, Scream Fortress etc, the community (well most of the community) is still playing the game. 
Team Fortress 2 has stood the test of time. It still has a growing player base even though it's a 10 year old game!
The gameplay is fluid for the most part, it's fun and enjoyable, it has built a economy around it too. Through hats and other items. I have also meet a lot of good people through it! Most of my friends too. 
     The game also has some humor to it through taunts and other voice commands. 
In my opinion, each class is balanced, each class has their own counter, etc. 
I would highly recommend this game to anyone who was to have a good time with free shooter.

I probably won't properly describe this game, but even so. Team fortress 2, this game is wonderfull, this is the first game which i've stopped nearby for an over a year now. I like many thing about this game, from the great, variable gamestyles to the sound effects and voice acting, many people are playing this game, and thus they form a strong comunity. After all time i've spent at this game, i know that even if im gonna start playing other different games, i still will be coming back to  one and only TF2. I recommend to try out this game for everyone .

The game is good for a free-to-play, but there are some issues:
-It takes too much time to connect to a server ( doesn't matter if it's a casual game or a community server ) and than it takes some time to synchronize.
-The backpack size is too low. Only 50 slots to store items including : equipped weapons ( 3 for a class loadout ), equipped cosmetics, metals and tookens, crates etc

Este juego me acompaña desde más de 5 años, y debido al tiempo puedo preguntarles a ustedes:
¿Enserio hay algun juego otro juego F2P que te ofrezca siquiera la mitad del contenido, la personalidad, la jugabilidad , la carisma o siquiera el humor que este?,  no verdad?.

Pues claro que no, porque nada se le compara 8)

I like the style; kinda clay looking but detailed and rich in colour. Feels nostalgic and with the fancy hats and (very infrequent but giant) updates it always feels new enough. Even the multitude of SFM trailers are entertaining.

Gameplay is good; you can buy cosmetics but everything that alters performance is fully available without charge (one guy told me tf2 was so Pay-to-Win because you can "buy gold weapons" - too much Fortnite lol - gold or not, the weapon performs just the same) 

Community is good; I mean you get people who would irl pay money to ruin your day, and then those who never leave your side. Sometimes it's rough, but hey, we are literally shooting at each other, what are you supposed to say?

Finally, its FREE. I'm actaully not quite sure why people read the reviews. I mean, if you want to see what the game is like, try playing it! You'll only lose time, and if you're like me that really doesn't matter.
